name: Pojitto
overview: Pojitto (Also know as Posit) is a 3D puzzle game with 16 different characters. The main part of the game is a sort of an arcade mode in which to advance in the game the player have to defeat the rest of characters. The game takes place in a fantasy world where animals and humans compete in a strange puzzle game. The gameplay is a mix between a chess and a puzzle game, moving just 2 pieces (a cube and the main piece). The game features different stages depending of the character. The game features also a vs mode against the computer or another human player.
